title: Understanding Cell Protection
text: When protecting a worksheet, consider which cells contain important data or calculations that should not be altered.

title: Identifying Key Areas
text: Think about the areas in your worksheet that contain formulas or critical values. These are often the cells you want to protect.

hintAnswer: formulas and values you don't want changed
title: Choosing Cells to Protect
text: Which cells in a worksheet are typically protected to prevent accidental changes?
choices: formulas and values you don't want changed
cells you want to be modified in the future
